definition: surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
variant of 索馬利亞|索马利亚[Suo3 ma3 li4 ya4]

sentences.english: And yet outsiders could still help Somalis to help themselves.
sentences.chinese: 然而外界還是可以幫助索馬里人實現自救。

sentences.english: The worst case is a Somalia-ization of Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 最糟糕的結果就是伊拉克的索馬里化。

sentences.english: That day was hastened when the sea-brigands of Somalia caught Chinese vessels, cargoes and sailors in the net of their brazen raids.
sentences.chinese: 當索馬里海盜綁架中國船隻，那一天加速到來。

sentences.english: Now, Somalia has telecom services among the best inAfrica.
sentences.chinese: 如今，索馬里有着非洲大陸最優質的電信服務。

sentences.english: In northern Somalia, a number of non-governmental anti-piracy organizations are growing.
sentences.chinese: 目前在索馬里北部，一些民間的反海盜組織正在成長。

sentences.english: Recently al-Shabab issued a statement inviting international agencies to return to Somalia.
sentences.chinese: 最近青年黨發表聲明，邀請國際機構返回索馬里。

sentences.english: China supports the holding of this high-level Security Council meeting on counter piracy off the coast of Somalia.
sentences.chinese: 中國支持安理會就索馬里海盜問題召開高級別會議。

sentences.english: The Gulf of Aden and the east coast of Somalia accounted for 130 of this year’s attacks.
sentences.chinese: 索馬里的亞丁灣和東海岸今年遭遇130次的攻擊。

sentences.english: S. Korea fears ship hijacked by Somali pirates.
sentences.chinese: 韓國船隻恐被索馬里海盜劫持。

sentences.english: This House believes that China should take military actions against Somalia pirates.
sentences.chinese: 本院認爲中國應對索馬里海盜採取軍事行動。

sentences.english: At the bottom of the listrankranked last for the 3rd year, is Somalia.
sentences.chinese: 排名最底的則是已經連續第三年排最後的索馬里。

sentences.english: A sandstorm in a refugee camp near the border of Somalia.
sentences.chinese: 一場沙塵暴席捲了索馬里邊境附近的一個難民營。

sentences.english: The only people who have sought physically to stop this dumping are Somali pirates.
sentences.chinese: 唯一挺身而出阻止這種傾倒行爲的人是索馬里海盜。

sentences.english: The pirates have been holding discussions for several hours in Harardhere on the Somali coast.
sentences.chinese: 海盜在索馬里海岸進行了幾個小時的討論。

sentences.english: She did not win a majority of the Somali-American votes in her district.
sentences.chinese: 她在自己的選區未能贏得多數索馬里裔美國人的選票。

sentences.english: The famine gripping Somalia is causing hundreds of thousands of desperate people to seek help wherever they can.
sentences.chinese: 索馬里的饑荒使數十萬索馬里災民四處逃荒求助。

pinyin: Wu1 zi1 bie2 ke4 si1 tan3
Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3
